message:
We can't wait to meet you again ! 

TLS is looking for First and Second year UG, PG and RS students to ride with us on our literary journey for upcoming years in KGP.

Selection Dates :
25th Aug, Friday, 6 PM onwards
26th Aug, Saturday, 2 PM onwards

Venue : F-131, Main Building

If you haven't registered yet, register at - bit.ly/tlsregistrations

Attention Freshers and Second Years! 

We're pleased to share that the registration link for selections in Technology Literary Society, IIT Kharagpur is now active. 

Please fill up the form at bit.ly/tlsregistrations and the dates and timings for the selection rounds will be intimated to you. 

We can't wait to have you aboard! 
For any queries contact: 
Swapnil : 8436945666
Aayush: 9932021533

Freshers!
Greetings from Technology Literary Society.
It's time to think through your fingers and frame those thoughts.

Team TLS cordially invites you to our Introductory Seminar.
Date : 12th August, 2017 Saturday
Time : 6:00 pm
Venue : Kalidas Auditorium

All are welcome. See you there.

कुछ सपनें हकीकत बन जाते हैं, तो कुछ सपनें ही बन कर रह जाते हैं | आँखें बंद करके तो हर कोई सपना देखता है पर खुली आँखों से जो सपनें देखते हैं उनकी बात ही कुछ और होती है | सपनें देखना अच्छी बात है पर मेहनत करके उसे पूरा करना और भी अच्छी बात |

For our people, who shall leave us after one final goodbye, we prepare a Souvenir.
For this to convey deep meanings and beautiful memories, we need your messages, your own words !
TLS invites all KGPians to send in their creative works (poems, articles, experiences, photos) for the Annual Institute Magazine ALANKAR at tlsblogs@gmail.com.
Works related to Kgp will be appreciated.

Design credits: Divyanshu Minz and Kamal Gurnani

message:
Technology Literary Society, invites all the Picassos and Michelangelos to be the part of our design team. We are hiring
Time: 6 - 7 PM | Sunday | 16.04.2017
Venue: Vikramshila Foyer

Register here : bit.ly/tlsdes
